content.description:
The low start to Honest Abe (V8).

Begin on the low crimp below the (V8) starting crimp.

Work up and to the left, linking into the start to Honest Abe and finish as per.

To the far right of Cheapside, find the right leaning arete corner. Look tot he right of the corner for a stand start edge to match. Start here, move to the crimp and then for the sloper lip at the arete. Take it to the top!

Considered by many to be this best V3 at Rumbling Bald, so don't miss it!  Start low hands matched in a jug and work your way up a couple of sloping pockets until you can gain the really awesome quartz "mailbox slot".  Get your feet up and make a long throw to the mantle.  Classic.
content.location: rom the approach walk down and right on an obvious trail when you reach the boulders.  Continuing down the hill will lead you to this boulder.  The landing zone is nice and flat, beautiful boulder, begs to be climbed!  This is the obvious line in the middle of the boulder that starts on the low jug and works up towards the "mailbox slot".

content.description: Sit start to the right of Slave Driver. Move up and right to a small side pull and slap for the top.
content.location: Slave driver boulder, to the right of slave driver.

content.description: Climb the fairly blank slab starting on two small crimps and pulling some crystals.  Pretty tough pulling and good footwork is key.
content.location: As you head down to Brackish Area this problem will be on the trail at the Slave Driver Boulder

content.description: Start on right and left hand jugs on the arete that is on the far left side of the boulder.  Make use of good crimps, bad crimps, and slopers to eventually gain the mantle.  This is rated V2 in the guide book but it feels a little harder to me.  Maybe I am missing something with the beta.
content.location: On the far left side of the Slave Driver boulder.
